review.title: “Deceptive Senior Partners with a record of NOT honoring agreements, contracts”
review.pros: Pros – Tough to find pros as the work was not very stimulating or innovating - everything is morphed into a GE WorkOut. So, the pro would be if you love repeating brainstorming sessions and crafting work-plans for under-performing teams in large companies you'll love this job.
review.cons: Cons – Deceptive and dishonest senior managementFailed to honor contracts during layoffs in 2009, leading to multiple complaints and lawsuits against the firmThe work is very repetitive and dull, little intellectual stimulation or challenge -everything is solved with a GE WorkOut (which is not rocket science)
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Reset and try to outsource values
